title: Between the Scenes - What Black People Can Do to Combat Voter Suppression
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - What Black People Can Do to Combat Voter Suppression
description:
According to Trevor, the best way for African Americans to fight voter suppression is to register as Republicans.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
